snippet: Chinese rescuers had evacuated 86 tourists trapped by heavy snowfall at the north base camp of Mount Everest, according to Xinhua, the state news agency.
abstract: Chinese rescuers have evacuated 86 tourists trapped by heavy snowfall at north base camp of Mount Everest.
lead_paragraph: Chinese rescuers had evacuated 86 tourists trapped by heavy snowfall at the north base camp of Mount Everest, according to Xinhua, the state news agency.

headline.main: China: Tourists Rescued on Mt. Everest
headline.print_headline: China: Tourists Rescued on Mt. Everest
